mapper.select: select count(booknum) cnt,sum(totalprice) tot from book join booklist on book.listnum= booklist.listnum where to_char(order_date,'yyyymm')=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-1),'yyyymm')
select count(booknum) cnt,sum(totalprice) tot from book join booklist on book.listnum= booklist.listnum where to_char(order_date,'yyyy')=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-12),'yyyy')
